about_the_game:
The FUNC Buster Starter pack contains 10 Cull Crates (each of which awards 4 standard cosmetic items) along with the exclusive FUNC Buster sledgehammer skin.

About The Culling
In a remote island paradise, 16 contestants have 25 minutes to explore, scavenge items, craft weapons, build traps, hunt and kill each other. There has never been a battle royale game this focused, brutal, and adrenaline-filled! Only one will be crowned the winner, do you have the guts to survive?

content_descriptors.notes: The Culling features Intense Violence, Blood, Suggestive Themes, and Drug Reference.

detailed_description:
The FUNC Buster Starter pack contains 10 Cull Crates (each of which awards 4 standard cosmetic items) along with the exclusive FUNC Buster sledgehammer skin.

About The Culling
In a remote island paradise, 16 contestants have 25 minutes to explore, scavenge items, craft weapons, build traps, hunt and kill each other. There has never been a battle royale game this focused, brutal, and adrenaline-filled! Only one will be crowned the winner, do you have the guts to survive?

linux_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: 2.7 or higher
  • Processor: Intel Core i5 4th Gen (4xxx)
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: DX11 GPU with 1GB VRAM: NVidia GTX 460/ AMD Radeon 5850
  • Storage: 100 MB available space
  • Additional Notes: SteamOS is supported, other Linux distributions will have minimal tech support

name: The Culling - FUNC Buster Starter Pack

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS *: 64-Bit OS Required: Win7 SP1, Windows 8.1, or Windows 10
  • Processor: Intel Core i3 560 / AMD Phenom2 X4 945
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: DX11 GPU with 1GB VRAM: NVidia GTX 460/ AMD Radeon 5850
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 100 MB available space
